name: Baï Ulygăn (Underworld)
shortLoreBlurb: Baï Ulygăn (Underworld) is a realm from Altai/Turkic associated with underworld, spirits. Acts as a gatekeeper or guide for souls and the order of death.
description: Baï Ulygăn (Underworld) is a realm from Altai/Turkic associated with underworld, spirits. Acts as a gatekeeper or guide for souls and the order of death.
